content:
The Institute of Computer Science at the University of Tartu in Estonia is
currently advertising a Full Professor position in Programming Languages:

https://ut.ee/en/job-offer/professor-programming-languages-0

Areas of particular interest include semantics and types, compilers and runtimes,
static/dynamic analysis, verification, synthesis, and language-based security.

The application deadline is 15.12.2025.

I would encourage anyone here who thinks they might be at all qualified to apply. In addition to Danel and myself, Matt Earnshaw and Ãœlo Reimaa are also in Tartu, so you would have people to talk to about category theory with. If you'd like more information about living in Tartu or Estonia more generally, feel free to message me here.
